skillTree.localised_description: Greatest among the wonders she encountered on her hunts near the Frozen Landing was Gjálfr, an ice wolf of incomparable size. Now, woman and wolf are inseparable companions.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: After the sacking of Vinnskor the Aesling sold Asta amongst the other slaves to a Bretonnian Noble, the undespicable torture she had to undergo still fuels her heart with mindless rage.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Bretonnia
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +10 when fighting against Bretonnia
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hiding in Bretonnian forests after escaping her faith, Asta is capable of finding or creating the tools she needs for her hunts.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Asta of Vinnskor may count her prowess among the shieldmaidens of the old Saga's. A valkyre in name and tale.
The Chieftess of the Baersonling supports the Jarl not just as her ruler, but as his most loyal, beloved and trusted advisor. An unbreakable bond indeed.
Whether in the forests of Bretonnia or the frigid wastes of the north, traps and preparation have served Asta well in her hunts.
Like her spouse, Asta is blessed by the Great Eagle - the changer of ways. They're loyalty to each other only matched by their loyalty to him.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: It is Asta, not Einarr, who manages the day-to-day affairs. Her gift for numbers and logistics have blessed the tribe with prosperity.
Asta concocts a mystical dish that grants potent healing to herself or an ally in battle, restoring them to full vigor with its mysterious properties.
Asta and Einarr's bond is one of devotion, passion, and united purpose. When Asta calls, the Baersonling Berserkers answer without hesitation.
There’s no need to rush when your target has little prospect of escape.

ui_effects.localised_text: Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target
Scaled projectile damage against combatants with missing health
Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.localised_description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Those who are blessed by the Great Changer shall not miss their mark, as their movement is foreseen.
The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: "I'm no pupil, but an adept! A hex on them, may their souls shrivel from their bones!"

effects.description: Assault Unit action: Additional 5% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 15% damage caused
Assault Unit action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

items.colour_text: Forged in the depths of the Ardenwood, Asta's bow, aptly named the Ardenwood Bow, embodies the fusion of Norscan resilience and Bretonnian grace. Crafted from sturdy Ardenwood trees, it bears the marks of Asta's indomitable spirit and her relentless quest for survival. Each arrow unleashed from its string carries the whispers of Asta's determination and the fury of her longing for vengeance. As she draws back the bowstring, she channels the strength of her people and the cunning of her newfound wilderness, striking fear into the hearts of her enemies and hope into the souls of her allies

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The fiercest of Shieldmaidens of the Baersonling is Asta of Vinnskor, huntress and champion of unparalled skill.

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range
